name: helically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in the form or shape of a helix (= a curve that goes around a central tube or cone shape in the form of a spiral): He wears a support brace that is wrapped helically around the wrist, palm, and thumb. It's an old-fashioned push lawnmower with a blade that rotates helically. Related word
helical
More examplesFewer examplesA helically threaded nail has a spiral thread along the shank and is similar to a screw. The compound is most often found in the form of a helically-shaped molecule.
